name: Twintris
overview: Inspired by the Amiga game of the same name, this is a simultaneous two-player Tetris game. Commodore Free #075 Features: * Two players at the same time * Ultra-smooth gameplay * 20 different levels with varying obstacles and features * Screen goes berserk when many lines are cleared at the same time Warning: Was originally not programmed with NTSC in mind, but it works if you can stand the minor screen shaking, which is due to the PAL FLD routine.
